alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 7:32PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Alameda, Contra Costa and northeastern San Francisco Counties through 830 PM PST... At 731 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emeryville, or over Berkeley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Concord, Berkeley, Richmond, Antioch, Livermore, Alameda, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg, Dublin, Danville, Martinez, Oakley, Pleasant Hill, San Pablo, Lafayette, El Cerrito and Castro Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline
